page.title: 17HOUSES
page.content: The disadvantages of modern houses is that you are crowded because they are next to each other and the neighbours are always looking at you.The new houses look like white boxes in rows. Flats are like little boxes on top of each other.The advantages of a new house is that you have two toilets. They are easier to clean because there are less rooms.There is a middle size kitchen which has a built_in cooker and cupboards plus work_surfaces. They are better designed and it is lighter inside and easier to sell because of these reasons. Another thing is that you live closer to all of your friends. {by Lesley Dean {
